title: DC once per minute
body: Hi I'm having issue last 2 days. I'v got DC once per minute (almost) but my internet is fine (TS3 etc. is working). Anybody w. same issue?

replies.body: It looks like you're having some packet loss, which can be caused by a weak connection.  I recommend running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for those matches to get an analysis of what is happening exactly.  Let me know what you find and if it helps!
